issue.title: [CF 180] Stacks... not showing anymore?
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: Attaching a saved variables file/screenshot will increase the likelihood of your problem being solved.
Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

I have a lot of tmw icons on all my characters... since 2 updates, i can't see buff stacks.. i can see buff with timer in the middle.. but i can't see anymore Stacks. for example i'm using a tmw icon to show my disci priest atonement stacks .. when i'm at 5 i can use evangelism... now i can see the timer but not the stacks number inside the icon :O
I checked conf window to see if you did some changes, but i can see i can now specify how many stacks to trigger the icon, but it changes nothin in my case.

Can you tell me how to fix it? Ty a lot :) TMW is too much important atm inside my raiding interface :D I check stacks everywhere (on my buffs, on bosses' debuff etc etc :))

comments.body:
Yeah, I broke it, sorry. fix inc. in a little bit.

If you don't want to wait, change the following line in Types/buff.lua:

``` icon:SetInfo(icon.Alpha, color, iconTexture, expirationTime - duration, duration, nil, buffName, count) ```

to this:

``` icon:SetInfo(icon.Alpha, color, iconTexture, expirationTime - duration, duration, nil, buffName, nil, count) ```

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
